Translations.Text: Hageze aho abantu iharurwa ryabo ry’umusi w’imperuka ryashitse nabo ataco bibuka n’uguhakana gusa
Ntabutumwa bushasha buzobashikira buvuye ku Muremyi wabo atari uko babwumva nabo babifata minenegwe
Imitima yabo yaribagijwe nabo bongorerana mumbari bamwe bahemukiye imitima yabo babwirana bati:- uyu Muhammadi (aui) atari uko ari umuntu nkamwe, noneho mwashikiye kuburozi namwe aho muri mwibonera
Intumwa y’Imana Muhammadi (iii) yavuze iti:- Umuremyi wanje niyo ifise ubumenyi bwibivugirwa mw’Ijuru no kw’Isi, nayo niyo yumva kandi niyo ifise ubumenyi buhagije

Mugabo abahakanyi b’Imana bavuze bati:- ibi vyose n’indoto zivanganye n’izindi, ahubwo nivyo yigiriye kubwiwe, kandi uyu muntu n’umwanditsi yiyandikira amajambo y’ubuhizi gusa, rero natuzanire ibitangaro nkuko barungitswe izindi ntumwa z’Imana zaho hambere
Ntibemeye abari imbere yabo aribo banyagihugu baba Qurayshi bo mugisagara icarico twahoneje, mbega aba bantu bazokwemera
Ntitwaba rungitse imbere yawe atari abagabo twahaye ubutumwa, rero nimubabaze abacibuka nimwaba mwebwe mutabizi
Natwe ntitwabahaye imibiri idafungura ibifungurwa, kandi ntibari kuba ari abantu bokubaho mubuzima bwabo bwose
Hanyuma	twarabemereye	amasezerano	nukubarokora	hamwe	nabo twishakiye, nuguhonya abamaze kurenga imbibe z’Imana
Ntankeka twaraba manuriye igitabu, murico harimwo ubutumwa kuri mwebwe, mbega ntimutegera
N’ibisagara	bingahe twahoneje	ku bantu bamye bahemukira	imitima yabo, natwe munyuma duca turema abandi bantu
Mugihe bikeka ibihano vyacu, mumwanya baciye batangura kwiruka
Ntimwiruke ahubwo nimugaruke kuvyo mwahora mwinezereza ko mumazu yanyu kugira ngo mubazwe
Nabo bavuga bati:- Oh! mu vy’ukuri twari mubahemukiye imitima yacu
Haca habandanya ivyitwazo vyabo kugeza naho tubagira nk’abatemwe nukuzimwa impwemu zabo nugucikana
Ntitwaremye Amajuru n’Isi hamwe n’ibiri hagati nkugufyinata
Iyo dushaka gufyinata twari kwigirira twebwe nyene nkiyo tuba dushaka gufyinata
Ahubwo ivyo dushaka kugira nibi:- nuguta ukuri hejuru y’ikinyoma kugaca kumena ifufu ry’umutwe hanyuma ikinyoma kikazimangana, n’ibihano vy’Imana birabarindiriye kubera ibi vyose muvuga
N’ibiri mumajuru yose no kw’Isi ni vy’Imana, n’abari iwe ntibishima mukuyi senga kandi ntibaruha
Bayininahaza ijoro n’umutaga kandi ntibadebukirwa
Canke baronse izindi Mana kw’Isi bakurikira
Nkiyo hobayeho iyo mw’Ijuru no kw’Isi izindi Mana atari Imana y’ukuri, ntankeka ayo majuru n’Isi yari kwononekara, mugabo Imana irisukuye, Umuremyi w’inyegamo yayo hamwe n’ivyo bayihayagiza ko
Imana ntibazwa ivyo ikora mugabo ibiremwa bantu bose nibo bazobazwa

Canke bafashe aho bofashe izindi Mana nk’Imana y’ukuri, wewe vuga uti:- nimuzane ivyemezo vyanyu kuko ivyo ndababwira n’icibutso c’abari kumwe nanje, hamwe nabamweho imbere yanje, mugabo benshi muribo ntabumenyi bw’ukuri bafise, kuri ivyo ntibavyitayeho
Ntawe ntitwa rungitse imbere yawe intumwa iyariyo yose mugabo twaramweretse yuko atayindi Mana isengwa atari jewe gusa, rero nimunsenge
N’abahakanyi b’Imana bavuga bati:- nyene imigisha myinshi yigiriye ikibondo, Imana irisukuye ahubwo abo bamarayika n’abashumvyi b’Imana bafise iteka ntangere
Ntibayitanguza ko ijambo, nabo bakorera kw’itegeko ryayo

Niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’ibiri imbere yabo hamwe n’ibiri inyuma yabo, nabo Bamarayika ntibasabira uwariwe wese ku Mana atari uwo Imana yemereye ivyo bisabisho vyiwe, nabo kubera ukuyitinya baragamburuka
N’uwuzovuga muribo ati:- jewe nd’Imana aho kubayo nyezina, uyo muntu tuzo muriha impembo y’umumuriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, uko rero niko duhemba abahemukiye imitima yabo
Mbega ntibabonye bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri yuko Amajuru n’Isi vyose vyakurikirana hanyuma turabi tandukanya hanyuma tugira mubijanye n’amazi ubuzima bw’ibintu vyose, mbega ntimwemera
Dushira kw’Isi imisozi, kugira ngo ntinyigange, hanyuma dushiramwo amayira aboneka ari k’umugaragaro kugira ngo abantu batumbere inzira bacamwo
Hanyuma tugira Ijuru kuba ari urusenge ruzitiwe neza mugabo abahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri bararengwa mukutemera n’ivyo bimenyetso vy’Imana
Nayo niyo yaremye Ijoro n’Umutaga hamwe n’Izuba n’Ukwezi, rero ivyo vyose bireremba mumizingi y’avyo vyagenewemwo
Natwe ntitwaremye ikiremwa muntu uwariwe wese w’imbere yawe ngo abe uwuzoramba burundu, none wewe niwasandaba nibo bazoramba mubuzima bw’abo bwose
Umutima w’umuntu uwariwe wese uzohonja urupfu, kandi turaba gerageza mubijanye n’ishari hamwe n’amahoro, n’iwacu mwese niyo muzosubizwa yo
Bakubonye bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri nta nakimwe bakugira, ahubwo bara kwimwenyura bavuga bati:- mbega uyu niwe avuga Imana zanyu nabi kandi abo nibo bahakana Imana nyene imigisha ihagije
Umuntu awariwe wese yaremwe yihutirwa, ubu vuba jewe nzobereka ibimenyetso vyanje, kuri ivyo rero ntimumputagize
Bavuga bati:- iri sango twemerewe ryuguhanwa rizoba ryari nimwaba muvugisha ukuri
Iyo babimenya bamwe bahakana Imana yabo y’ukuri mugihe batazokingira umuriro uzoba uri mumaso yabo canke mumigongo yabo kandi batazofashwa
Ahubwo uzoba shikira giturumbuka kandi uze ubahendeshe hanyuma ntibazo shobora kuwusubiza inyuma canke ntibazohabwa ikiringo kanaka
Ntankeka barakengereye intumwa z’Imana zabayeho aho hambere yabo, rero bamwe bakengereye izo ntumwa z’Imana muribo barashikiwe nivyo bahora bakengera ko
Vuga uti:- ni nde ashobora kubakingira mw’Ijoro no k’Umutaga n’ibihano vy’Imana, mugabo kuribo ntibitaho mukwibuka Umuremyi wabo
Mbega barafise izindi Mana zibakingira gusumba twebwe, none ntibashobora kwifasha bonyene, kandi ntibazo kingirwa natwe

Ahubwo twaraba nezereje cane abo bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri hamwe n’abavyeyi babo kugeza naho ubuzima bwabo buba burebure kubera ivyo, mbega ntibabona yuko tugira kuri iy’Isi yabo nukugabanya imbibe zayo? Mbega nibo bene intsinzi
Vuga uti:- jewe ndiko ndabatuza kumajambo y’ubutumwa bw’Imana, rero intumva ntizumva ubutumwa naho zotuzwa
Naho bokorwako n’igice gitoyi gusa c’ibihano vy’Umuremyi wawe, ntankeka bovuze bati:- ibi bihano vyacu mu vy’ukuri twebwe twarahemukiye imitima yacu

Natwe tuzo shiraho iminzani y’ukuri k’umusi w’imperuka n’umutima w’umuntu uwariwe wese ntuzo hemukirwa na gatoyi naho coba ico kintu gifise uburemere bw’igishishwa c’umutende tuzo bishikiriza natwe turahagije kuba abamenyi buguharura
Mu vy’ukuri twarahaye intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Haruna (iii) igitabu gitandukanya n’umuco hamwe n’ubutumwa kubantu bagamburukira Imana y’abo y’ukuri
N’abatinya Umuremyi wabo mugihe biherereye, kandi bagatinya n’umusi w’imperuka
N’iyi Qur’ani n’ubutumwa bwahezagiwe twamanuriye kuri wewe, mbega mwebwe murabuhakana
Mu vy’ukuri twarahaye intumwa y’Imana Ibrahimu (iii) uburongozi bwiwe kuva kera kandi twari tumuzi neza
Mugihe yabwira Se wiwe hamwe n’abantu biwe ati:- mbega aya masanamu mwicarirako imisi yose muyasenga
Nabo bamwishura bati:- twebwe twasanze basogokuru bacu bayasenga
Nawe abishura ati:- ntankeka mwebwe hamwe nabaso banyu mwari mubuzimire buri k’umugaragaro
Nabo	bamwishura	bati:-	mbega	waje	ngaha	ufise	amajambo	y’ukuri canke uri mubantu bafyinata
Nawe	abishura	ati:-	ahubwo	Umuremyi	wanyu	n’urya	muremyi w’Amajuru n’Isi yayaremye, nanje ndi muvyabona vyemeza ibi vyose
Ndarahiye kw’izina ry’Imana yuko jewe nzoyagirira nabi aya masanamu yanyu nimwampa umugongo mugenda iyo mugenda
Rero aca arasenyura yamasanamu yose ayagira ibimanyu manyu, asigaza ryasanamu rininiya muriyo kugira ngo barisubire mwo
Bagarutse bavuze bati:- ni nde yagize gutya izi Mana zacu? Mu vy’ukuri uyu muntu ari mubahemu bakuru
Baca bavuga bati:- twumvise umusore umwe yitwa Ibrahiimu (iii)
Bati:-	nimu	murengutse	imbere	y’amaso	y’ishengero	ry’abantu bamubone neza kumabi yiwe
Bavuga	bati:-	mbega	ni	wewe	wagize	gutya	izi	Mana	zacu	wewe Ibrahimu
Nawe abishura ati:- Oya! uwabigize gutyo n’iri sanamu rikuru ryabo, rero nimuribaze yuko ashobora kuvuga kubijanye n’ibi bintu
Baca	bisubirako	babaza	imitima	yabo	nukuvuga	bati:-	mu	vy’ukuri mwebwe mwamye muhemukira imitima yanyu
Hanyuma baca bunamika imitwe y’abo hasi bavuga bati:- mu vy’ukuri uramaze kumenya yuko aya masanamu atavuga n’ikintu nakimwe
Abishura ati:- mbega mwebwe musenga iyitari Imana ataco ibamarira n’ikintu na kimwe kandi ata nabi ibagirira
Nimuceceke	nivyo	musenga	biteye	kubiri	n’amasengesho	y’Imana, mbega mwebwe ntimutegera
Bavuga bati:- nimu muturire n’umucanwa kugira ngo murokore Imana zanyu nimwaba mwebwe muri mubagira ikintu nyaco
Natwe duca tuvuga duti:- wa mukomezwa we! nube imbeho n’amahoro kubera intumwa y’Imana Ibrahiimu (iii)
Bamusabiye inabi mugabo twaciye tubagira kuba aribo bene uruhombo
Duca turamurokora hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Lutwi (iii) tubajana mukindi gisagara twahezagiye kubera abantu bose

Nayo intumwa y’Imana Ibrahiimu (iii) twamuhaye ikibondo citiriwe izina rya Is’haqa (iii) hamwe n’uwundi yitwa Ya’aqubu (iii) kuba ariwe mwuzukuru wiwe, na bose twaciye tubagira kuba ari abantu beranda

Hanyuma turaba hezagira kuba indongozi ziyobora abandi bantu kw’itegeko ryacu, nukuba rungikira ubutumwa nukuba bwereka nukugira ineza hamwe n’uguhagarika amasengesho hamwe n’ugutanga imperezwa, kandi iwacu bamye ari abantu batu gamburukira

Intumwa y’Imana Lutwi (iii) twaramuhaye amategeko n’ubumenyi nukumurokora n’abantu b’ico gisagara camye kigira amarorerwa mabi cane, ntankeka abo bantu bari abantu babi cane basenyura amategeko y’Imana
Duca twinjiza iyo ntumwa y’Imana Lutwi (iii) mumihezagiro yacu, mu vy’ukuri yari mubagira ineza
Kandi bibuke intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (iii) mugihe yashikiriza ubutumwa bwiwe aho hambere, natwe twaramwemerera, duca turamurokora hamwe n’abantu biwe mungorane niniya nkizo
Twaramurokoye kubera abantu bahakanye amajambo yacu, mu vy’ukuri abo bantu bari abantu babi cane, duca tubibiza mumazi bose uko bangana

Kandi ubibutse kubijanye n’intumwa y’Imana Daudi (iii) hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Sulaimanu (iii) mugihe baca urubanza kubijanye n’itongo mugihe zarisha muri iryo tongo intungwa z’abandi mw’ijoro, natwe kubera urwo rubanza twari ivyabona

Duca tubwira intumwa y’Imana Sulaimanu (iii) n’umwe muribo twamuhaye intahe n’ubumenyi, hanyuma duca tugamburutsa imisozi yose hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Daudi (iii) ihayagiza Imana, tugamburutsa n’inyoni nazone zigamburukira Imana hamwe nawe natwebwe nimubagira ivyo dushaka
Duca twigisha intumwa y’Imana Daudi (iii) ingene yohingura impuzu z’ingwano kubera mwebwe, kugira ngo zibakingire mungwano zanyu, mbega muzoba muri mubantu bashima
No kuntumwa y’Imana Suleimanu (iii) twara gamburukije umuyaga ukaze cane ugira kumategeko yiwe ngaha kw’Isi twahezagiye natwe nitwebwe dufise ubumenyi bw’ibintu vyose
Twara gamburukije amashetani yibirira mumazi nukugirira ibindi bikorwa bitari ivyo, natwe twari muba bacungera
N’intumwa y’Imana Ayyubu (iii) mugihe Umuremyi wiwe yamu hamagara avuga ati:- jewe nahuye n’ingorane, nawewe niwe ufise Impuhwe gusumba abandi batanga impuhwe
Twaramwemereye nukumukurira ingorane yari afise, duca tumuha abantu biwe n’abandi b’akarorero nkabo bari kumwe nabo, n’impuhwe zivuye iwacu hamwe n’icibutso ciza kubantu bagira amasengesho yabo
N’intumwa y’Imana Ismaili (iii) hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Idrissa (iii) hamwe na Dhul’kifli (iii) abo bose bari muntumwa z’Imana zitenyenya
Duca twinjiza mumpuhwe zacu, kuko bari mubantu beranda

N’uwitwa Dha-nnuni ariwe ntumwa y’Imana Yunusu (iii) mugihe yagenda nawe bamwihakanye abiwe nawe aca yiyumvira yuko twebwe tutazo mushobora, rero yaciye ahamagara ari mumwijima avuga ati:- ntawundi asengwa bimwe vy’ukuri atari wewe gusa uninahazwa, mu vy’ukuri jewe nari muba hemukiye imitima yabo
Turamwakirira igisabisho ciwe nukumurokora mugahinda yarimwo, uku rero niko turokora abantu bemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri
N’intumwa y’Imana Zakariya (iii) mugihe yahamagara Umuremyi wiwe avuga at:- Muremyi wanje ntunsige ndi jenyene, na wewe niwe mwiza wabasigirwa ibisigi

Duca turamwemerera ibisabisho vyiwe nukumuha intumwa y’Imana Yahya (iii), nuguca dukiza umutambukanyi wiwe, ntankeka bari bafise umwete wukugira ineza nukudusaba n’ishaka ryinshi hamwe nugutinya, nabo bari bafise ubugamburutsi ntangere
Nuwikingiye k’umutima wiwe nuguhuhera umutima wacu nukumugira ngo abe hamwe n’umwana wiwe kuba ari ibitangaro ku bantu bose
Mu vy’ukuri aba bantu banyu n’abantu bamwe nanje ndi Umuremyi wanyu, kuri ivyo nimunsenge
Nabo baca baradohoka kuri rino jambo ryabo riri hagati yabo, kandi nabo bazo garuka iwacu
N’uwuzogira ibikorwa vyiza mugihe nawe ari umu Isilamu uyo muntu ntazo kwankirwa kumwete wiwe yagize, mu vy’ukuri ivyo yagize twebwe tuzovyandika
Kirazira yuko igisagara twahoneje yuko abo bantu bazogaruka iwacu
Kugeza aho hazobohorwa uwitwa Ya’ajuja na Ma’ajuja nabo bamanuka bava kumisozi yose
Hazoshika kuri rya sango ry’ukuri, ari naho hazosokoka amaso y’abahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri bavuga bati:- Yoh! Ntankeka twebwe twari mubiyibagiye nibi bintu, ahubwo twarahemukiye imitima yacu
Mu vy’ukuri mwebwe hamwe nivyo musenga mukureka gusenga Imana yanyu y’ukuri, muzoba muri inkwi z’uwo muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, namwe muzowu shikira
Iyo aba ari izindi Mana, ntibari gushikirwa nuwo muriro witiriwe Jahannamu, n’ingene bangana bose bazoba bari muri uwo muriro udahera
Muri uwo muriro udahera bazo komerayo induru, nabo muriwo ntibazo kwumva
Mu vy’ukuri abo ineza yacu yashikiye, bazoba bari kure nuwo muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu
Ntibazo kwumva isumo ryuwo muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, nabo bazowubamwo mubuzima bwabo bwose kuvyo bipfuriza imitima yabo
Ntuzoba tetereza ubwo bwoba buhanitse, n’Abamarayika bazoba sanganira bababwire bati:- uwu niwo wamusi wanyu mwamye muraganirwa
Umusi tuzozinga amajuru nkakumwe tuzinga urupapuro twandikako, nkuko twatanguye irema ryambere niko tuzorisubira mwo kurigira, iyi n’indagano iri hejuru yacu kandi ntankeka nitwebwe tubigira
Mu vy’ukuri twaranditse mugitabu c’Imana ca Zaburi munyuma yaho twandika k’urubaho rubitswe neza yuko iy’Isi izosigirwa abantu banje beranda
Mu vy’ukuri muri ibi vyose harimwo ubutumwa ku bantu bagira amasengesho y’ukuri
Natwe ntitwa kurungitse atari uko wobabera impuhwe ku bantu bose
Vuga uti:- jewe sinahawe ubu butumwa atari uko Imana yanyu ari Imana imwe yonyene rudende gusa, mbega muremeye kuba aba Isilamu
Nibatemera kuri ivyo wewe n’uvuge uti:- ndabamenyesheje bimwe vy’ukuri yuko jewe atabumenyi mfise bw’ibiri hafi canke ibiri kure y’ivyo mwahawe ko indagano
Mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’imvugo iri k’umugaragaro hamwe n’ubumenyi bw’ivyo munyegeza
Kandi ntanakimwe nomenya yuko ari urwanko kuri mwebwe n’umunezero kugeza kumwanya mugufiya gusa
Yavuze ati:- ewe Muremyi wanje nubacire urubanza rw’ukuri, n’Umuremyi wacu niwe nyene impuhwe asabwa imfashanyo kuri ivyo muvuga vyose. mito
